welcomeDescription: Manage your shop's credit transactions easily. Track customers, add items, send notifications, and back up data securely—all for free!
addCustomerDesc: Go to 'Add Customer' to enter customer details like name, phone, and address.
addItemDesc: Use 'Add Item' to predefine products with prices for quick credit entry.
addCreditDesc: In 'Credit Tracker', select a customer, add items, and save credits or payments.
manageGroupsDesc: Organize customers into groups in 'History' to view their transactions together.
backupDataDesc: Export data as CSV in 'Backup' and save it to Google Drive for safekeeping.
featureCreditTracking: Track credits and payments with ease.
featureCustomerGroups: Group customers for family or business transactions.
featureDarkMode: Switch to dark mode for comfort.
featureCSVBackup: Export/import data as CSV for backups.
featureAnalytics: View top customers and overdue credits.
faqBackupQuestion: How do I back up my data?
faqBackupAnswer: Go to 'Backup', export as CSV, and upload to Google Drive manually (free up to 15GB).
faqNotificationsQuestion: Can I send notifications for free?
faqNotificationsAnswer: Yes, use WhatsApp click-to-chat or copy-paste SMS manually—no paid APIs needed.
faqGroupsAnswer: In 'History', add customers to groups to filter their transactions together, like a family or business.
faqCreditQuestion: How do I add a credit?
faqCreditAnswer: In 'Credit Tracker', select a customer, enter items, and save. Use predefined items for speed.
interestingFact: {name} has made {count} transactions, the most active customer!
aboutDescription: Thala Credit Manager is a free, open-source app to help shopkeepers manage credit transactions easily.
aboutPurpose: Built to simplify credit tracking for small businesses, with no costs or complex setups.
backupDescription: Keep your data safe by exporting it as CSV and uploading to Google Drive.
googleDriveInstructions: After exporting CSV, log in to Google Drive, click 'New' > 'File Upload', and select your CSV file. Your data is safe with 15GB free storage!
